sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button, Typography, Box } from '@mui/material'; const FormConfirmAddPlant = ({ plantInfo, setFormConfirmVisible, handleSubmit}) => { return ( Please confirm to add your new plant. {plantInfo.name} Category: {plantInfo.category} Qty: {plantInfo.quantity} Size: {plantInfo.size} Description: {plantInfo.description} Price: ${plantInfo.price} ) } export default FormConfirmAddPlant;
